speeches: You look pretty weak. Don't try to run away, okay?
Damn, you beat me! Maybe I should have run away, hahaha!
But you didn't, you chose to fight me to the end.
Yeah... thanks a bunch. A pretty lady like you doesn't happen to have a free party slot?
I would love to have someone like you in my army. Won't you join me?
Hahaha... to think I'd be needed again... Alright young lady, I'll join your force!
